Description: Wheelmade Nile silt pottery cup with straight sides, simple direct rim and recessed spot base. Well-sorted eggshell fabric, but heavy in weight. Cup is covered in red slip interior and exterior. Exterior given two black painted lines below rim, and one black painted line above base. Between, straight sides are decorated with rows of impressed rosettes. Part of rim lost. Reconstructed rim diameter 7cm. Adams Type A11 (1986, fig. 19).
